SummaryEnglish: The peaceful days of the very popular work Bungou Stray Dogs are here. The characters of the Armed Detective Agency and the Mafia are in miniature form?! Due to Atsushi and co. becoming cute, this is a different experience to the original work—a pleasant gag manga!
TitleJapanese: 文豪ストレイドッグス わん！
SummaryJapanese:
モダンな街の喧騒に、舶来の風吹き抜ける
架空の都市「ヨコハマ」で、いにしえの文豪の名を懐く者たちが
その名になぞらえた「異能力」による死闘を繰り広げていく
アクションバトル大作「文豪ストレイドッグス」。

あの、哭き喚き魂を削り合い、生と死の極限をひた疾走る
「武装探偵社」や「ポートマフィア」のキャラクターたちが――
まさかの愛らしくミニマムな姿となって、ボケてツッコみ大暴れ!?

1.TitleEnglish: Bungo Stray Dogs REAL / What's Inside the Locker? / An Unfruitful Exchange
1.SummaryEnglish: The fight for city turf is cut short when breakfast is served. Dazai and Atsushi are on clean-up duty, and the lockers are in pretty rough shape. Higuchi forces Akutagawa and Nakahara into an awkward situation.

2.TitleEnglish: Let's Go Flower Gazing! / To the Baths!
2.SummaryEnglish: Atsushi is assigned to keep a spot at the park for cherry blossom watching. The bath breaks down at headquarters, and the Agency hits the bath house.

3.TitleEnglish: Operation Errand Run / Finders Kyouka's / Rampo-san's Day Well Spent
3.SummaryEnglish: Yosano needs some shopping done. Rampo offers to do it for her. Kyouka comes home with a lost cat.

4.TitleEnglish: Akutagawa-kun's Errands / The Mafia Member Who Doesn't Kill / Forming a Duo With Him
4.SummaryEnglish: Dazai sends Akutagawa on some errands, but despite his best efforts, he doesn’t seem to have what it takes to go shopping.

5.TitleEnglish: Dazai and Chuuya, Pretentious Fourteen-Year-Olds / A Day in Yokohama / The Boy and the Puppy
5.SummaryEnglish: Dazai and Chuya are middle schoolers who just can’t seem to get along.

6.TitleEnglish: Dazai-san's Nail Biter / If Only I Could Express My Hundred Thoughts / Please Share! Armed Detective Agency!
6.SummaryEnglish: Dazai tapes a sign on Kunikida’s back as a prank, but it turns out that Kunikida was about to head to a meeting with some important people.

7.SummaryEnglish: The gang are in preschool, and Dazai is in charge. Atsushi and Akutagawa vie for his attention.

8.TitleEnglish: Hang in There, Higuchi-san! / And the Tracks Go On and On / Operation Body Double Nom Nom
8.SummaryEnglish: Akutagawa catches the flu. Ichiyo does everything in her power to help him, but she just can’t seem to make things work.

9.TitleEnglish: Dr. Yosano's Whoopsies! Forgetfulness / Miscellany on Shrimp Tails / Me Drawing You Drawing Me
9.SummaryEnglish: Yosano realizes that her scalpel is missing. Worried that she might have left it in one of her patients, she panics.

10.TitleEnglish: Oden with the White Tiger / Elevator Panic / The Armed Detective Agency Beats the Heat
10.SummaryEnglish: Dazai decides to make oden on a cold, cold winter day, but there’s only one problem: he doesn’t know how to make oden.

11.SummaryEnglish: Dazai decides to write new year’s greeting cards, but it’s not clear if he has the humanity to pull it off.

12.TitleEnglish: Swap Theater / My Treasure / Nakajima Atsushi's Plan
12.SummaryEnglish: Dazai and Atsushi swap minds when they bonk heads. Datsushi doesn’t mind, but Azai wants him to stay out of trouble. Atsushi tries to get back at Dazai for all the times he’d surprised him.
